name: Scribble Gen
description: A simple adaptation of a program I made for a class, as an entry to Proc Jam. It just makes a black line made up of small black squares, with a chance to curve and a low chance to branch another line off of it. The black on white is supposed to resemble ink on paper, but in practice the lines seem to resemble plants more than a drawn line, with the constant curve and branching.
